Scope and Contents
This collection includes 49 letters from Abraham Lincoln Brigade veteran (and 1933 NYU graduate) Martin Krauss (aka Mac Kraus) to his wife, Evelyn R. Krauss, during World War II. The collection also contains Spanish Civil War photographs, and materials issued by the Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade (VALB), including a questionnaire designed to collect information on American volunteers who served as ambulance drivers in Spain (distributed by Krauss) and documents related to the incorporation of ALBA.
